data.name: Darkscape White BG Fix for Firefox Scrollbar
data.description:
In sites like Youtube and Reddit, the specific way in which their Dark Mode/Theme is implemented results in Firefox having a light scrollbar. This userscript fixes this issue on the following sites
 - Youtube
 - Reddit
 - Sharepoint

Comment to have more sites added to the list.
